channel.title: The OpenGL Programming Guide - The Redbook
channel.description:
I personally haven't read this yet, but I have herd nothing but good things about it. [url=http://www.opengl.org/documentation/red_book/]The OpenGL Programming Guide - The Redbook[/url]
I would suggest buying it, but for those of you who are like me and want to make sure they're use what they're buying, [url=http://fly.cc.fer.hr/~unreal/theredbook/] here it is in HTML format (supported by opengl.org)[/url] and [url=http://up.ht/ri1Iib] here it is in PDF format (probably not supported by opengl.org)[/url].
If anyone has any problems with this being here, I won't argue its removal.

item.title: The OpenGL Programming Guide - The Redbook
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

I know the topic is a bit old but just wanted to say thanks, was looking for a pdf version. Don’t know crap about opengl besides it can do what I need it to lol.

Read full topic
item.source: The OpenGL Programming Guide - The Redbook
